snippet.title: Mad TV (PC Game)
snippet.description:
Mad TV is a little-known videogame in which you run your own TV station and decide what shows go out on air. You get to select news to air, buy movie rights, organize live shows and more. It's a very fun game. More info here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mad_TV_(video_game)

You can also play the remake here:
http://www.madtv-online.com/

There's a spiritual successor called Empire TV Tycoon which you can get on Steam.

Thanks for checking out my video, I also stream on twitch! I play ps5/switch/vr games.

The latest schedule is available on my Twitter account at @ZephyrDerg
